# VOIDCHAT

A minimal real-time chat app built with **React + Socket.IO**.
No database. No auth. No persistence.
Just temporary rooms and raw communication.

---

## âš¡ Features

* Real-time chat using Socket.IO
* Auto-generated usernames
* Temporary chat rooms
* Room expiration timer
* Destroy room option
* Dark, minimal UI
* No data stored anywhere

---

## ðŸ§± Tech Stack

* React (Vite)
* JavaScript
* Tailwind CSS
* Node.js
* Socket.IO

## ðŸš€ Run Locally

### Backend

```bash
cd server
npm install
node index.js
```

### Frontend

```bash
cd client
npm install
npm run dev
```
